---
title: "R25시각화-plotly"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(plotly)

p <- plot_ly(iris, x=~Sepal.Length, y=~Sepal.Width)
p <- plot_ly(data=iris, x=~Sepal.Length, y=~Sepal.Width,
             color=~Species, colors='Set2')

p


p <- plot_ly(mtcars, y=~mpg, type='box', color=~cyl)

p

```
